title: Constrained Optimal Transport for Semi-Supervised Domain Adaptation

featuredImage.alt: Abstract illustration of optimal transport flows

excerpt: Developed and tested constrained optimal transport algorithms for semi-supervised domain adaptation and leveraging flexibility in resource allocation.

title: Optimal Transport for Industrial Data: Anomaly Detection and Variable Matching

featuredImage.alt: Abi presenting at IEEE Big Data 2024

excerpt: Applied optimal transport methods to industrial datasets for efficient unsupervised anomaly detection, and for variable matching in LM-coding tasks where structured taxonomies are unavailable.

title: Breaking Societal Unfairness through Barycentric Correction

featuredImage.alt: Graph showing how societal biases can impact predictions.

excerpt: Developed an algorithm for correcting societal unfairness in data through correcting for biases conditional on so-called 'explanatory variables' such as access to education.
